keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

lead_paragraph: Mr. Bemba led a militia that committed rape and murder in the Central African Republic in 2002 and 2003, the International Criminal Court found.

headline.print_headline: Congolese Politician Convicted of War Crimes for Rapes by Militia
headline.main: Congolese Politician, Jean-Pierre Bemba, Is Convicted of War Crimes

snippet: Mr. Bemba led a militia that committed rape and murder in the Central African Republic in 2002 and 2003, the International Criminal Court found.
abstract: International Criminal Court convicts Jean-Pierre Bemba, former vice president of Democratic Republic of Congo  of war crimes and crimes against humanity for mass murders and rapes in Central African Republic in 2002 and 2003.
